source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_00<tab>Konogg is ready to proceed...with caution.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_00<tab>複製サレタ工場廃墟のコノッグは、旅の者の意見を聞きたいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_01<tab>Konogg asks whether you will support him in keeping whatever you discover in your search for the so-called “key” secret from 2P should she be restored to functionality. Though the point is largely moot until such a time arrives, you agree to follow his lead and set off to search the ruins without further ado.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_01<tab>コノッグと話し、遺跡の調査に同行することになった。複製サレタ工場廃墟の「コノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_02<tab>You catch up to Konogg, who, despite some trepidation, suggests that you once again use the pods to press further into the factory. Admittedly, no alternative has presented itself since your foray with 2P, so you have no choice but to cling to one of the pods for dear life and allow it to whisk you away.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_02<tab>コノッグと話した。複製サレタ工場廃墟の「コノッグ」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_03<tab>Deeper inside the ruins, Konogg instructs you to use the mysterious tetrahedral devices positioned throughout to teleport to the entrance should you wander too far. Thus equipped with contingency measures, you are free to begin searching for the mysterious key.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_03<tab>コノッグと再度話した。遺跡の中で道に迷ってしまった場合は、箱型の転送装置を利用することで、入口まで戻ることができるようだ。複製サレタ工場廃墟を探索して、遺物などがあれば回収しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_04<tab>A cursory search of the factory yields a hunk of metal that you deem worthy of note. It would be best to get a second opinion from Konogg, however, lest you find yourself lugging around a hundred ponzes of useless garbage.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_04<tab>複製サレタ工場廃墟を探索して、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FDE01 /var>を入手した。複製サレタ工場廃墟の「コノッグ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_05<tab>Fortunately, Konogg, too, believes that what you found may be a piece of the all-important key. If you locate the others, the siblings may be able to reassemble it.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_05<tab>コノッグに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FDE01 /var>を渡した。コノッグの見立てでは、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FDE01 /var>には他のパーツが存在しており、組み合わせることで何かの装置になる可能性があるようだ。複製サレタ工場廃墟を探索して、遺物を回収しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_06<tab>Further inspection of the area yields not only what you believe to be two more pieces of the key, but also a pod─albeit one that has seen better days. The dwarven duo will be delighted.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_06<tab>複製サレタ工場廃墟を探索して、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FDF01 /var>、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FE001 /var>、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FF201 /var>を入手した。複製サレタ工場廃墟の「コノッグ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_07<tab>Forcibly inserting herself into the discussion as soon as it becomes apparent that you've found something of worth, Anogg declares the array of parts you have collected sufficient to bring back for inspection and possible reconstruction. She also takes an interest in the pod, though its sudden return to functionality puts something of a damper on her plans to fiddle with its innards, and a clever device of her own design soon reveals a third exciting discovery─the motionless form of 9S, who, like 2P, must have lost the ability to function after your pitched battle. Though Anogg is willing to cooperate with 2P, that willingness evidently does not extend to outright trust, as she opts to keep 9S both intact and secret from the other android.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_07<tab>複製サレタ工場廃墟で入手した遺物を「コノッグ」に渡した。調査を終えた一行が、機械遺跡の坑道に戻ろうとした時、アノッグの探査機が反応を示す。反応を頼りに遺跡の最奥部まで向かうと、そこには、２Ｐが倒したはずのアンドロイドの少年が倒れていた。アノッグは、少年を発見したことを、２Ｐには伏せておきたいという。複製サレタ工場廃墟の「アノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_08<tab>Now with plenty of new toys to play with, Anogg and Konogg withdraw to the tunnels to examine your finds in greater detail. You may join them whensoever you are convinced that there are no more secrets worth finding in the immediate vicinity.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_08<tab>アノッグと話した。機械遺跡の坑道に戻り、「アノッグ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_09<tab>In the excavation tunnels, you speak with Anogg, who has been working to piece together the components you gathered. Unfortunately, there is no means of knowing whether her efforts have met with success until the pod has completed its analysis. Stymied, she reluctantly decides to set to work studying the other data collected within the ruins instead, and asks that you ensure that the dig site chief will not interfere with the twins' research.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_09<tab>アノッグと話した。遺跡で回収した遺物を組み上げたところ、何かの装置のような物が出来上がったという。ポッドによる装置の読み取り処理が終わるまで、しばらく待つことになりそうだ。コメラの村の「ドワーフ族の親方」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_10<tab>You speak with the dig site chief, who is shockingly amenable to the idea of letting Anogg and Konogg continue their investigation─perhaps in part because the alternative is getting involved in the messy business himself. Still, he vouches for their technical competence, so you may have confidence that the secrets of the ruins will be revealed in due course.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SEQ_10<tab>ドワーフ族の親方と話した。遺跡に始まり、アンドロイド、機械生命体と言った未知の存在の謎は深まるばかりだが、まずは、ポッドの分析が終わるのを待とう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Konogg in the Copied Factory.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_00<tab>複製サレタ工場廃墟のコノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Konogg again.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_01<tab>コノッグと再度話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_02<tab>Search for artifacts in the factory.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_02<tab>複製サレタ工場廃墟を探索して遺物を回収

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the part to Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_03<tab>回収した遺物をコノッグに渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_04<tab>Search for more parts in the factory.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_04<tab>複製サレタ工場廃墟を探索して遺物を回収

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the parts and pod to Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_05<tab>回収した遺物をコノッグに渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Anogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_06<tab>アノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Anogg in the excavation tunnels.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_07<tab>機械遺跡の坑道のアノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_08<tab>Speak with the dig site chief.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_08<tab>コメラの村のドワーフ族の親方と話す

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_09<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_09<tab>

target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_10<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_23<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_TODO_23<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_001<tab>There's no point in arguing further─she's immune to reason when she gets like this.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_001<tab>どうやらアノッグは、ボクの意見を聞く気はないようですね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_002<tab>I'm happy to continue investigating─of course I am, that's why we've gone to all of this trouble─but we need to be careful as to how we go about it. Especially where 2P is concerned.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_002<tab>ボクはあのアンドロイドをまだ信用することができません。
調査は必要だとしても、そこで得た情報は慎重に管理すべきです。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_003<tab>I don't trust her─at least not yet. Even should we find this “key,” we ought to be discreet as possible about sharing our plans and information. Don't you agree?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_003<tab>というわけで、今回の調査は別行動になります。
アナタは「ボク」か「アノッグ」か、
どちらについていくか選んでください。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>Should you give your support to Konogg's approach, Anogg's path will no longer be available to you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>「コノッグ」に声をかけてストーリーを進行させると、
「アノッグ」に声をかけた場合のストーリーを、
進行させることができません。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Please note, however, that your choice will not affect the rewards and challenges to come.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>なお、どちらを進行しても、得られるアイテムや、
挑戦できるコンテンツなどに、変化はありません。
自身の価値観に従い、進むべき道を選択してください。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_Q2_000_000<tab>Support Konogg's approach?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_Q2_000_000<tab>「コノッグ」の考えに賛同して、
ストーリーを進行させますか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_007<tab>Indeed. I knew you'd have the sense to listen to me. Now, let's get started, shall we?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_007<tab>やはり経験豊富な旅人は聡明ですね。
では、慎重に調査していきましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_008<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_008<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_025<tab>I don't like relying on this place's internal mechanisms, particularly to dangle me over a gaping chasm, but it seems we have little choice. Maybe if I close my eyes...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_025<tab>このポッドとかいう機械、ずっとここにいるみたいだけど……
とりあえず、ワレワレを運んでくれるみたいですね。
これに掴まって、向こうまで行きましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_050<tab>Before we proceed, we should decide upon what to do in the event that we become lost in this maze of a place.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_050<tab>そうだ、先に進む前に、
遺跡の中で道に迷ってしまった時の対処を決めておきましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_051<tab>These teleportation devices should serve. If you can't find your way back to me, use one to return to the entrance immediately. I'll meet you there.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_051<tab>前回ここに来た時、箱型の転送装置を利用しましたか？
どうやら、これを使えば遺跡の入口まで戻れるようです。
遺跡を引き返すときは、この機械を使いましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_052<tab>Got it? I'd hate to lose our muscle because you wandered off and fell into a pit somewhere.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_052<tab>奥へ向かうほど、元の場所に戻るのが難しくなるだろうから、
気を付けて先に進みましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_053<tab>Now you're free to take a look around. If you find anything noteworthy, bring it to me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_053<tab>遺跡の中で変わったものを発見したら、
ボクに渡してください。
それでは調査に向かいますよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_100<tab>Found anything of note yet? Records, artifacts, weird puddles of goo?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_100<tab>先に進む前に、
この辺をもっと調査してみましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_200<tab>That's the look of a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who's on to something! Do share.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_200<tab>おや、何か気になる物でもありましたか？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_201<tab>Hmm... I'd bet that whatever this is, it's part of a greater whole.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_201<tab>これは、何かのパーツみたいだ。
でも……部品が足りない？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_202<tab>Let's see if we can find any similar pieces. We may be able to reassemble it, if so.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_202<tab>これを組み立てると、何かの装置になるのかもしれない。
ほかにもパーツが落ちていないか、探してみましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_210<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_210<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_250<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_250<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_300<tab>You have more parts for me, I trust?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_300<tab>遺跡で拾ったものを渡してください。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_100_300<tab>Don't be a miser, now. Let me see them too!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_100_300<tab>何か見つけたのか？
ワタシにも見せてくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_301<tab>Oh, look at all of these parts! And this pod! I've been so wanting to take one of these apart...
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_301<tab>どれどれ、パーツはすべて集まったかな？
むむ……この壊れかけた機械は……
ポッドじゃないか！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_302<tab>...Do you hear something?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_302<tab>アノッグ……この機械、何か喋ってる……？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_POD_000_303<tab>Function resumed. Initiating repair process.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_POD_000_303<tab>……修復……機能確認……。
……処理プロセス……起動……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_POD_000_304<tab>Alert: multiple lifeforms detected in proximity.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_POD_000_304<tab>……付近に……を検知……。
複数の生体反応を……確認しました。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_305<tab>“Lifeforms” would be us, I presume? Interesting.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_305<tab>生体反応……それって、ワレワレのこと？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_306<tab>If it's still functional, there's no need for me to disassemble it. Pity. Still, I say we take it back with us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_306<tab>周りのものを読み取って、認識する機能があるのか……？
壊れかけのようだが、何かの役に立ちそうだ。
これも持って帰ろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_307<tab>Oh! What's this?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_307<tab>向こうの方から、反応があるぞ……。
行ってみよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_100_308<tab>It's him! Though how he climbed back up here in that state...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_100_308<tab>ア、アレは！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_308<tab>Well, Sister, you're the one who wanted to work with 2P. I'm sure she would say to destroy him for good. What do <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> say?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_308<tab>確かにここから落ちたはずなのに……
自力で戻ってきたのか……？
…………どうするの？　アノッグ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_309<tab>Oh, brother, you know me too well.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_309<tab>あの２Ｐって女が知ったら、
「壊せ」って言う可能性があるな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_310<tab>We take him with us, of course. Just in case. It'll be our little secret.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_310<tab>こいつは調べたほうがいいかもしれない……。
持って帰って、ワタシ達だけの秘密にしておこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_315<tab>How's investigating with Konogg going for you? Slowly, I expect?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_315<tab>コノッグとの調査は終わったのか？
興味深い発見があったら、ワタシにも教えてくれたまえ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_350<tab>Konogg and I will be heading back out. I want to perform a proper analysis on these parts as soon as possible.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_350<tab>ワタシはコノッグとともに拠点に戻る。
早速、遺跡で見つけたものを調べないといけないからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_351<tab>I don't blame you if you want to look around a bit more first─though you had best share your findings!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_351<tab>キミもこの遺跡を調べ終えたなら、
拠点に顔をだしてくれたまえ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_352<tab>This may be the clue we've been searching for. I only hope it doesn't blow up in our faces...in any sense.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_352<tab>調査に協力してくれて、ありがとうございました。
しかし、大変なのはこれから……
遺跡の謎を解明しないといけないですからね。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_400<tab>It's about time!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_400<tab>戻ったか、旅の者よ。
遺跡で集めたパーツを組み上げてみたのだが……。
どうやら、何かの装置みたいなんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_401<tab>You know those parts we found? Well, I've managed to cobble them together into a decent approximation of...something.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_401<tab>何かわからないかと思って、ポッドに読み取らせてみたのだが、
「複合処理プロセス」というものを行っているらしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_402<tab>I was hoping that if I got the basics right, the pod could tell us what it's meant to be, but it won't stop repeating “processing” and beeping at me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_402<tab>……まぁ、それが何のことなのかは、
結局のところわからないのだが……
とにかくその処理に時間がかかるらしい。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_403<tab>It worked when it was analyzing <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var>, so theoretically it should be up to the task, but it seems we'll have to wait for it to finish...whatever it is that it's doing.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_403<tab>とりあえずはその計算待ち……という事になるな。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_404<tab>I'm half-tempted to take my tools to it, but if I can't put it back together we'll be back to square one. So─patience it is. Hmph!
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_404<tab>何か進展があったら報告する。
それまで待っててくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_405<tab>In the meantime, we have quite a bit of other data to analyze. So much, in fact, that I'm certain we will need a considerable amount of time─uninterrupted time─to work. If you take my meaning.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_405<tab>ワレワレはこれから調査結果のまとめにはいる。
そこで、親方がまた余計なことを言ってこないように、
釘を刺しておいてほしいのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_406<tab>I'm telling you to keep the chief off our backs for a while─I don't care how. Say that his house is on fire, if you like. Or put it to the torch, if you're not comfortable with lying.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_406<tab>心配するな、適当に言いくるめておいてくれればいい。
もちろん何かわかったら、親方にもちゃんと知らせるからな。
よろしく頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_410<tab>We simply don't have the time for half a dozen lectures about “protocol” and “safety” and “ethics,” you understand?
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_ANOGG_000_410<tab>親方がまた余計なことを言ってこないように、
釘を刺しておいてほしいのだ。
よろしく頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_415<tab>I thought that “key” was a figure of speech, but...it looks like it could potentially be an unlocking mechanism. If you squint.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_415<tab>アノッグから報告があるようですよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_POD_000_420<tab><beep> Processing...
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_425<tab>You heard Anogg: we're counting on you to keep the chief occupied so that we don't have to.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_KONOGG_000_425<tab>親方の件、よろしくお願いしますね。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_DWARFMASTER03671_000_450<tab>Lali-mysterious machines from the ruins will kill us all-ho, I suppose.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_DWARFMASTER03671_000_450<tab>あぁ旅の人か、
バタバタしていてすまない。
遺跡の機械達が暴れた件の対応に追われていてな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_DWARFMASTER03671_000_451<tab>Sorry, it's...been a lot to take in. Did you manage to keep our local miscreants out of trouble?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_DWARFMASTER03671_000_451<tab>ところで、アノッグとコノッグはどうした？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_Q1_000_000<tab>親方に何という？

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_A1_000_001<tab>They're safely studying our discoveries as we speak.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_A1_000_001<tab>遺跡の調査結果をまとめているところだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_A1_000_002<tab>I found them to be surprisingly competent, actually.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_A1_000_002<tab>頑張ってるみたいだから、そっとしておいてあげて。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_DWARFMASTER03671_000_453<tab>It's true that when it comes to mechanical contraptions, you'll find none cleverer than those two. Or more obsessive.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_DWARFMASTER03671_000_453<tab>うーむ……。
今回の件に関しては、あいつらの報告を待つしかないか。

source: TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_DWARFMASTER03671_000_454<tab>If anyone's capable of solving the mystery of these ruins, it's them. Much as I hate to say this, we should leave them to their own devices. For now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKTA120_03721_DWARFMASTER03671_000_454<tab>旅の人にも頼り切りになってしまったな……。
こんな小さな村のためにありがとう、感謝する。
大したものじゃないが、お礼の品だ、受け取ってくれ。
